channel.title: What is a good 317 source without a lot of custom stuff added?
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I was thinking about making a server again, but I don't want to have a bunch of custom stuff that just ruins a server in my opinon. I found the source for the moparscape client and am using that, so I am looking for a good server source without customs. I looked into Hyperion, however, it's kind of hard for me to get used to (after using deltascape for 3 years lol). Anyway, I just need a few suggestions that I could research and see what I like best.
Thanks, Ghostly150

ect.

Read full topic

item.title: What is a good 317 source without a lot of custom stuff added?
item.dc:creator: @Mee0345 Mee0345
item.description:
@Mee0345 wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:3, topic:449666”][quote author=Immortal Technique link=topic=552557.msg4048949#msg4048949 date=1342311000]
Just remove the customs yourself.
[/quote]
or not use them[/quote]
Or even better, not play runescape at all so its just like a whole new game and so it doesn’t make them seem like customs?

Read full topic
